name: Bingo Holiday Christmas 2018
description:
***Play NOW & Enjoy Christmas Bingo Santa's Gifts for FREE!!***

Join other players in the unique social bingo with Xmas Theme; the fun always takes place on the most Holly night of the year around the globe! It's that time of year again and what better way to enjoy this festivities period than with a great Xmas Bingo Game!

Enjoy unique sets of features, with lots of interesting levels and enjoyment. Play with animated Christmas bingo cards and special rooms! Chat with different users, play against them and simply enjoy this great stress free game!
Fun & Full of Christmas lights, we thought that the next step would be adding some Xmas music & sound effects to deliver a total Holiday gaming experience!

Download Now & Enjoy the Christmas all year!
